properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 9:45AM CST until February 16 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River...Town Creek.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River near Amory
* until Sunday February 16.
* At 09 AM Tuesday the stage was 26.8 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring AND Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 28.5 feet on Tuesday February 11.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Monday February 10 and will
continue rising to near 28.5 feet by Tuesday February 11. The river
will fall below flood stage Sunday February 16.
* At 30.0 feet...Highway 6 between Amory and Bigbee is flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Wednesday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
